docs.text: 🌍 GlobEx Global Economy Welcome to the official documentation for GlobEx , a professional, modular Discord economy bot template. Why GlobEx? Unlike standard bots, GlobEx uses a Global Economy model. A user's balance, bank, and stats follow them across every server that uses your bot instance. Global Sync: One database, infinite servers. Competitive: Integrated robbing and global leaderboards. Secure: Built-in banking system to protect assets.

docs.text: 🚀 Installation 1. Clone the Repository git clone https://github.com/mrpandolaofficial-art/GlobEx.git cd GlobEx 2. Setup Environment python3 -m venv venv source venv/bin/activate pip install -r requirements.txt 3. Configure .env Rename env.example to .env and add your DISCORD_TOKEN . 4. Run the Bot python3 main.py
